<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107866</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107866</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204419</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chem-speak (introduction to chemical equations)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chem-sprechen Sie (Einleitung in eine chemischen 
Gleichungen)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chem-parlez (introduction aux équations 
chimiques)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chem-fale (introdução às equações químicas)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chem-parli (introduzione alle equazioni chimiche)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θχεμ-μιλήστε (εισαγωγή στις χημικές εξισώσεις)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Chem-hable (introducción a las ecuaciones 
químicas)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will understand what constitutes a chemical reaction and how chemical equations represent chemical reactions by means of discussion and demonstrations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer verstehen, was eine chemische 
Reaktion festsetzt und wie chemische Gleichungen chemische Reaktionen 
mittels der Diskussion und der Demonstrationen darstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants comprendront ce qui constitue une 
réaction chimique et comment des équations chimiques représente des
réactions chimiques au moyen de discussion et démonstrations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes compreenderão o que constituem uma 
reação química e como equações químicas representa reações 
químicas por meio da discussão e das demonstrações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi capiranno che cosa costituisce una 
reazione chimica e come equazioni chimiche rappresenta le reazioni 
chimiche per mezzo di discussione e dimostrazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα καταλάβουν τι αποτελεί μια χημική 
αντίδραση και πώς οι χημικές εξισώσεις αντιπροσωπεύουν τις 
χημικές αντιδράσεις με τη βοήθεια της συζήτησης και τις 
επιδείξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes entenderán qué constituye una 
reacción química y cómo las ecuaciones químicas representa 
reacciones químicas por medio de la discusión y de demostraciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107866</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/chem-speak-introduction-to-chemical-equations</uri>
